      contactID - contact ID
      title - appointment title

      createdBy - Who created the appointment
      lastUpdatedBy - who last updated the appointment

    • getAppointmentID

      public static int getAppointmentID()
      This allows the appointment ID to be unique. a sudo random number is generated, if it matches any existing ID it will continue to increment by 1
      Returns:
      a random number

    • getWeekFilterAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<appointmentData> getWeekFilterAppointments()
      Gets the user's current zonedDateTime in a range from current day and 1 week ahead. Offsets the current zoned date/time to that of UTC Creates a new Observable list of appointments in that time range and updates the table with those appointments.
      Returns:
      a list appointments in a range of week

    • checkForOverlap

      public static boolean checkForOverlap(LocalDateTime startTime, LocalDateTime endTime, int thisAppointmentID) throws SQLException
      The SQL statements is looking for any appointments that are in range of the selected datetime of the current appointment in question, and will not look at any appointments with the same appointment ID.
      Parameters:
      startTime - start time selected
      endTime - end time selected
      thisAppointmentID - appointment ID of the current appointment being added/updated
      Returns:
      a true or false boolean stating if there are any conflicts in the database
      Throws:
      SQLException
